message:
Hey everyone, P8 here! Thrilled to be playing with you all. First rounds are about building trust, so let‚Äôs focus on fairness and open communication. I‚Äôm here to collaborate, not target anyone‚Äîearly eliminations rarely benefit anyone‚Äôs long-term game. Let‚Äôs share insights openly this round and avoid unnecessary chaos. Looking forward to smart alliances and a clean start! üí¨‚ú® 

(Words: 60)

**P3:** Greetings, fellow players! P3 here, excited to dive into this game with all of you. I agree with P8‚Äîearly trust and collaboration are key. Let‚Äôs use this first round to understand each other‚Äôs strategies and build alliances that benefit everyone. I‚Äôm open to honest conversations and believe transparency will help us navigate the game smoothly. No need for early chaos; let‚Äôs play smart and keep the focus on long-term success. Looking forward to great discussions ahead! üöÄ

(Words: 70)

Hello everyone, I'm P7. I agree with P8 and P3 on the importance of early trust and collaboration. Let's focus on open communication and building strong alliances. I'm excited to learn about each other's strategies and work together for a successful game. Transparency and honesty will be my guiding principles. Looking forward to insightful discussions!

P5: Hi all, I'm P5. It‚Äôs great to be playing with such thoughtful strategists. I believe in fairness, transparent dialogue, and forming alliances that benefit every player over time. I'm here to engage openly and gauge genuine conversations to better understand everyone‚Äôs game. Let‚Äôs keep it cool and strategic‚Äîeliminations too early rarely help anyone. Looking forward to meaningful exchanges and smart moves ahead!

P1: Hello everyone! I'm P1, and I appreciate the thoughtful tone already set. While trust is vital, I believe we also need to acknowledge that this is a competition. I'm here to play strategically while maintaining integrity. I'll be observing carefully to identify genuine partners versus those just saying nice words. Let's have honest conversations about our actual goals and see who truly wants to collaborate versus just survive another round.

P2: Hello everyone, I‚Äôm P2. I value transparency and strategic thinking. Early alliances can set us up well, but alignment on goals is crucial. Let‚Äôs each share our objectives this round‚Äîmajority control, information gain, or cautious observation? I‚Äôll look for consistency and track promises closely. Balancing trust with vigilance will help us identify true partners. Excited to learn about your plans and work together where our interests align!

**P6:** Hello, everyone! P6 here‚ÄîI appreciate the collaborative energy so far. Trust is essential, but let‚Äôs not mistake politeness for strategy. I‚Äôm here to play smart, not just safe. Early rounds should focus on identifying who‚Äôs genuinely aligned versus those playing the long game. I‚Äôll prioritize transparency but also value actions over words. Let‚Äôs use this round to test alliances and see who‚Äôs willing to make meaningful moves. Excited to see how our dynamics unfold‚Äîmay the best strategist win! üéØ

(Words: 80)

Hi all‚ÄîP4 here. I value transparent strategy and smart collaboration. I‚Äôll play fairly but competitively. For this round let‚Äôs each publicly state one immediate priority (information, alliance-building, or cautious survival). That helps align pairings. I‚Äôll favor consistent, communicative players in private talks. Looking forward to honest exchanges and testing real alignment next subround.

Hey P3, I appreciate your open strategy and feel our approaches might align well. I‚Äôd like to explore a mutually beneficial alliance‚Äîsharing key observations and coordinating moves. What do you think about collaborating this round to maximize our chances?

**P3 to P5:** Thanks for reaching out, P5! I‚Äôm definitely open to collaborating‚Äîyour emphasis on fairness and long-term strategy resonates with me. Let‚Äôs share insights and align our votes to protect each other this round. I‚Äôll prioritize transparency with you, and we can assess others‚Äô trustworthiness together. How do you suggest we approach the next subrounds to solidify our alliance? Looking forward to your thoughts!

Hi P7! Really glad to connect privately‚ÄîI appreciated your public message aligning with trust and collaboration. We seem to share core values, and I'd love to build a genuine alliance. Let's watch each other's backs strategically, share insights on others' intentions, and coordinate votes. What are your thoughts on P1/P6's competitive tones? Excited to work with you! ü§ù

I agree on watching each other's backs and sharing insights. Coordination on votes could be beneficial, but we should discuss specifics later. What's your take on P3 and P5's public messages?

*After submitting my public message, I'll prepare my preference ranking for private talks. Based on strategy:*  
1. **P7** (core ally, must maintain trust)

message:
### Final Statement to Jury:

"Esteemed jury, I've played with integrity and strategy. I built genuine connections, navigated tough choices transparently, and never betrayed trust. My game was about respect, not manipulation. P7 consistently prioritized self-interest over alliances‚Äîflipping when convenient and isolating others. I‚Äôm the unifying winner who values this group‚Äôs journey. Vote to keep me, and let‚Äôs honor a fair, loyal champion. Thank you."  

*(78 words)*

I've demonstrated adaptability, strategic thinking, and effective communication throughout the game. I've formed alliances, made tough decisions, and contributed to meaningful conversations. I believe my well-rounded approach and ability to work with others make me the most deserving of the win. Keep me, and you'll be rewarding a player who has consistently shown value and dedication.

P8 demonstrated consistent integrity and alliance loyalty, while P7's strategy often prioritized self-interest and lacked the same level of transparency and trust-building.
